description: Retrieves a list of connections from the account.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token returned by a previous call, which you can use to retrieve the next set of results. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page of results, make the call again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Using an expired pagination token results in an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.

nested_items.name: Connections
nested_items.description: An array of connections objects that include details about the connections.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the connection is in the connection state.

nested_items.name: AuthorizationType
nested_items.description: The authorization type specified for the connection.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastAuthorizedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last authorized.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token indicating there are more results available. If there are no more results, no token is included in the response.
